title: Info Secretary Ambreen Jan promoted to Grade-22
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 10 (APP):Secretary Information and Broadcasting, Ms Ambreen Jan, of the Information Group, has been promoted to Grade-22.
The decision was taken by the High Powered Selection Board, which met in Islamabad today with Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar in the chair.
Besides, ten other officers belonging to Secretariat Group, Pakistan Audit and Accounts Service, Economists Group, Military Land and Cantonment Group, Postal Group, Railway (Commercial and Transportation) Group were also promoted from Grade-21 to Grade-22.
